thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shang Hai Kai Kai Industry sees FY 2017 net profit up 80 pct to 90 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shang Hai Kai Kai Industry sees FY 2017 net profit up 80 pct to 90 pct

organizations.name: shang hai kai kai industry co ltd

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Shang Hai Kai Kai Industry Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to increase by 80 percent to 90 percent, or to be 38.3 million yuan to 40.3 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 21.3 million yuan
* Comments that increased investment income and clothing income as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ZKtaHy
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
